wt.security

Class NetAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • Access
      • wt.security.NetAccess

  • public class NetAccess
extends Access
    Class that provides wrappers to priviledged network methods using the wt.security package. This allows applets to perform network operations that are typically restricted by the sandbox.

    Supported API: true

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getNetAccess

        public static NetAccess getNetAccess(java.awt.Frame parentFrame)
        Get instance of NetAccess. This instance can then be used to perform network operations that are typically restricted by the sandbox.

        Supported API: true
        Parameters:
        parentFrame - the parent frame for security dialog boxes that may be presented

      • getNetAccess

        public static NetAccess getNetAccess()
        Get instance of NetAccess. This instance can then be used to perform network operations that are typically restricted by the sandbox.

        Supported API: true

      • connect

        public final void connect(java.net.URLConnection connection)
                   throws WTSecurityException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Wrapper for URLConnection.connect() method.

        Supported API: true
        Parameters:
        connection - the URLConnection object to be connected
        Throws:
        WTSecurityException
        java.io.IOException

      • getInputStream

        public final java.io.InputStream getInputStream(java.net.URLConnection connection)
                                         throws WTSecurityException,
                                                java.io.IOException
        Wrapper for URLConnection.getInputStream() method. This can be necessary if the connection is an HttpURLConnection where getInstanceFollowRedirects() returns true and the request is redirected to a host other than that which the security manager allows (e.g. a host other than that which an applet came from).

        Supported API: true
        Parameters:
        connection - the URLConnection to get the input stream from
        Returns:
        InputStream resulting from connection.getInputStream()
        Throws:
        WTSecurityException
        java.io.IOException

      • getResponseCode

        public final int getResponseCode(java.net.HttpURLConnection httpUrlConnection)
                          throws WTSecurityException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Wrapper for HttpURLConnection.getResponseCode() method. This can be necessary when HttpURLConnection.getInstanceFollowRedirects() returns true and the request is redirected to a host other than that which the security manager allows (e.g. a host other than that which an applet came from).

        Supported API: true
        Parameters:
        httpUrlConnection - the HttpURLConnection to get the response code from
        Returns:
        response code resulting from httpUrlConnection.getResponseCode()
        Throws:
        WTSecurityException
        java.io.IOException

                                        throws WTSecurityException,

        Supported API: true
        Throws:
        WTSecurityException
        java.net.UnknownHostException
